get.summary: Get the latest hotel and air booking for a particular user.
get.description: Get the latest hotel and air booking for a particular user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Optional. The login ID of the user. The user must have the Web Services Admin (Professional) or Can Administer (Standard) user role to use this parameter.

BookingClass.description: The booking class of the latest booked airline segment.

Code.description: The airline code of the latest booked airline segment.

Location.description: The IATA airport code of the location of the latest booked hotel segment.

StarRating.description: The star rating of the latest booked hotel segment. Possible values are from 0 - 5. Values 1 - 5 are mapped to the Northstar standard. If the value is 0, the star rating could not be found.
